experiences.description: Developed and deployed machine learning models for predictive maintenance in industrial equipment. Implemented anomaly detection algorithms to identify potential equipment failures. Collaborated with engineers to integrate models into the existing monitoring system. Used Python, scikit-learn, and TensorFlow. Improved prediction accuracy by 15%.

Led a team of data scientists in building recommendation systems for e-commerce platforms. Conducted research on personalized user experiences and novel recommendation algorithms. Utilized collaborative filtering and deep learning techniques. Managed model deployment and monitoring on AWS. Mentored junior data scientists. Increased click-through rates by 10%.

Currently leading the data science efforts for a remote team focused on developing AI-powered solutions for healthcare. Building and deploying machine learning models to improve patient diagnosis and treatment. Working with a large dataset of medical records. Using PyTorch, TensorFlow, and cloud-based infrastructure. Focused on ethical AI practices and data privacy.

education.description: Specialized in Machine Learning and Data Mining. Thesis focused on "Novel Approaches to Anomaly Detection in Time Series Data". GPA: 4.8/5.0. Relevant coursework included Statistical Inference, Pattern Recognition, and Database Systems.

education.institution: AGH University of Science and Technology
education.description: Focused on software engineering and algorithm design. Participated in a research project on "Parallel Computing for Big Data Analytics". GPA: 4.5/5.0. Relevant coursework included Data Structures, Algorithms, and Operating Systems.
